function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in enclosed spaces leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread among occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air purification technologies.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, natural ventilation designs.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially in educational spaces.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, architects, and engineers."},{"Description":"Inefficient heat exchange control in building envelope leading to climate-related health risks.","Impact":"Increased discomfort and susceptibility to climate-related illnesses for occupants.","Mitigation":"Optimizing building envelope design and insulation to control heat exchange.","Technologies":"Smart insulation materials, energy-efficient windows, climate control systems.","People":"Occupants of the building, particularly in educational spaces.","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners, and facility managers."},{"Description":"Inadequate parking configuration leading to congestion and close contact situations.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded parking areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing efficient and spaced-out parking configurations.","Technologies":"Automated parking systems, smart parking guidance systems, and optimized layout design.","People":"Users of the parking facility and surrounding areas.","Owner":"Parking facility operators, urban planners, and architects."}]}
